segments.en: And today we're bringing you part four of our romantic series called I'm Sorry I Love You.
segments.cn: 今天我们为您带来浪漫系列的第四部分，叫做《对不起，我爱你》。

segments.en: Yeah, and today we've got some drama, don't we?
segments.cn: 是的，今天我们有一些戏剧，不是吗？

segments.en: We've got a lot of drama and we've got a lot of useful language.
segments.cn: 我们有很多戏剧，还有很多实用的语言。

segments.en: Yeah, we're going to learn some phrases we can use to describe a mistake.
segments.cn: 是的，我们将学习一些可以用来描述错误的短语。

segments.en: And we're also going to learn how we can comfort someone.
segments.cn: 我们还将学习如何安慰别人。

segments.en: We can make them feel better.
segments.cn: 我们可以让他们感觉好一些。

segments.en: So in our dialogue today, Veronica and her boyfriend are on a break.
segments.cn: 在我们今天的对话中，Veronica和她的男朋友正在休息。

segments.en: So what does it mean to be on a break?
Well, it means you stop having a romantic relationship for a short time.
segments.cn: 嗯，这意味着你暂时停止浪漫关系。

segments.en: So you can say, we are on a break.
segments.cn: 所以你可以说，我们在休息。

segments.en: Or we could say, let's take a break.
segments.cn: 或者我们可以说，休息一下。

segments.en: Right, so we've got the state, on a break, and the action, take a break.
segments.cn: 对，所以我们有状态，休息，以及动作，休息一下。

segments.en: Okay, so let's listen to her dialogue and it's going to be a little bit fast.
segments.cn: 好的，所以让我们听听她的对话，可能会有点快。

segments.en: And the girl, I think she's crying.
It'll be a little bit difficult to understand.
But Marco and I will come back in a minute and we'll talk about some of the difficult language here.
segments.cn: 但Marco和我会在一分钟后回来，讨论一些这里的难懂语言。

segments.en: So, so I said, let's take a break.
And since that night, I've been waiting for him to call, but I still haven't heard from him.
segments.cn: 自那天晚上以来，我一直在等他打电话，但我仍然没有听到他的消息。

segments.en: You don't think he's seeing someone else, do you?
segments.cn: 你不认为他在和别人约会吧？

segments.en: Come on, don't be so dramatic.
I'm sure everything is going to work out just fine.
segments.cn: 我相信一切都会好起来的。

segments.en: How could he do this to me?
I'm sure he's cheating on me.

segments.cn: 不然他为什么不打电话？

segments.en: But you two are on a break.
Theoretically, he can do whatever he likes.
segments.cn: 理论上，他可以做任何他想做的事。

segments.en: He's the love of my life.
Come on, hon, pull yourself together.
It's going to be all right.
I can't believe how immature and selfish I was being.
segments.cn: 我真不敢相信我有多不成熟和自私。

segments.en: I mean, he is a firefighter.
segments.cn: 我的意思是，他是一名消防员。

segments.en: It's not like he can just leave someone in a burning building and meet me for dinner.
segments.cn: 他不可能就这样把人留在燃烧的建筑里，然后来和我吃晚餐。

segments.en: You know what, Veronica, I think you should make the first step.
segments.cn: 你知道吗，Veronica，我觉得你应该迈出第一步。

segments.en: No, this is not going to happen.
Wow, that's a romantic boyfriend singing in the street.
segments.cn: 哇，那是一个浪漫的男朋友在街上唱歌。

segments.en: Have you ever done that for a girl?
segments.cn: 你曾经为女孩做过这样的事吗？

segments.en: Have you ever sung to a girl on KTV?
I've sung to a girl on KTV.
Karaoke, yeah, but not so much as on the street with all the neighbors coming out to see me.
segments.cn: 卡拉OK，是的，但没有像在街上让所有邻居出来看我那样。

segments.en: All right, let's take a look at the language that we saw in our dialogue on Language Takeaway.
segments.cn: 好吧，让我们看看我们在对话中看到的语言，语言收获。

segments.en: All right, so let's take a look at our first word, seeing someone.
segments.cn: 好吧，让我们看看我们的第一个词，和某人约会。

segments.en: So if I'm seeing someone... You're dating them.
segments.cn: 所以如果我和某人约会……你在和他们约会。

segments.en: I'm frequently going out with that person.
So, but it's not very serious.
It's more of a casual thing.
segments.cn: 这更像是一种随意的关系。

segments.en: So if you are seeing someone, then you can also see another person.
segments.cn: 所以如果你在和某人约会，那么你也可以和另一个人约会。

segments.en: Well, I think sometimes seeing someone can mean actually they're your boyfriend or girlfriend.
segments.cn: 嗯，我认为有时候和某人约会可以意味着他们实际上是你的男朋友或女朋友。

segments.en: Yeah, see, this is the difficult thing about seeing someone is that for some people it means it's really serious, while for other people it means it's more casual.
segments.cn: 是的，看到某人的困难之处在于，对于某些人来说，这意味着非常严肃，而对于其他人来说，这意味着更随意。

segments.en: I guess it's important that you and your boyfriend or girlfriend share the same view on the meaning of this word.
segments.cn: 我想你和你的男朋友或女朋友对这个词的含义有相同的看法是很重要的。

segments.en: I have to agree on what seeing someone means.
segments.cn: 我们必须就和某人约会的含义达成一致。

segments.en: Well, what's our next word, Marco?
segments.cn: 那么，Marco，我们下一个词是什么？

segments.en: So if you're cheating on someone.
segments.cn: 所以如果你在背叛某人。

segments.en: Then you are like kissing or even having sex with someone who's not your boyfriend or your husband or your girlfriend or your wife.
segments.cn: 那你就像是在亲吻或甚至和一个不是你男朋友或丈夫，或者不是你女朋友或妻子的人发生性关系。

segments.en: So if I say she cheated on me, that means that my girlfriend kissed or had sex with another guy.
segments.cn: 所以如果我说她背叛了我，那意味着我的女朋友亲吻或和另一个男孩发生了性关系。

segments.en: But if I say she cheated me.
segments.cn: 但如果我说她欺骗了我。

segments.en: Maybe she sold you something for a really high price.
segments.cn: 也许她以非常高的价格卖给你一些东西。

segments.en: Or maybe she sold me something that was fake.
segments.cn: 或者也许她卖给我一些假货。

segments.en: Or yeah, or broken or broken.
segments.cn: 或者是，或者是坏的或损坏的。

segments.en: So cheated on is really different from cheated.
segments.cn: 所以“背叛”与“欺骗”真的很不同。

segments.en: Let's take a look at our next word.
segments.cn: 让我们看看下一个单词。

segments.en: So Marco, this is a phrasal verb and that means we can sort of switch it around a little bit, right?
segments.cn: 所以马尔科，这是一个短语动词，这意味着我们可以稍微调整一下，对吧？

segments.en: Why don't we listen to some examples and then we can come back and talk some more.
segments.cn: 我们为什么不听一些例子，然后再回来聊聊。

segments.en: I messed up on the exam and now I won't pass my class.
segments.cn: 我在考试中搞砸了，现在我无法通过我的课程。

segments.en: When I'm cooking, I always mess up and burn the rice.
segments.cn: 当我做饭时，我总是搞砸，烧焦米饭。

segments.en: Let's take a look at our next word.
segments.cn: 让我们看看下一个单词。

segments.en: So when someone is immature, they're acting really young.
segments.cn: 所以当某人不成熟时，他们的行为真的很年轻。

segments.en: But it's not a very good thing to be immature.
segments.cn: 但不成熟并不是一件好事。

segments.en: No, it has a negative meaning.
It's normal for children to be immature.
So we've got some examples that will help you to understand this word a little bit better.
segments.cn: 所以我们有一些例子可以帮助你更好地理解这个词。

segments.en: Your toilet jokes are not funny.
God, you and your friends always act so immature.
segments.cn: 天哪，你和你的朋友总是表现得如此不成熟。

segments.en: Now let's take a look at our next word.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看下一个单词。

segments.en: Is a person who only thinks about themselves.
So I only think about me.
You don't care about other people's feelings.
segments.cn: 你不关心其他人的感受。

segments.en: So it's not a good thing to be immature or selfish.
segments.cn: 所以不成熟或自私都不是好事。

segments.en: So I think it's time for us to listen to our dialogue again.
segments.cn: 所以我认为是时候再听一次我们的对话了。

segments.en: We're going to slow it down a little bit.
And this will help you to understand these phrases a little bit more clearly.
segments.cn: 这将帮助你更清楚地理解这些短语。

segments.en: So I said, let's take a break.
segments.cn: 所以我说，让我们休息一下。

segments.en: And since that night, I've been waiting for him to call.
segments.cn: 从那天晚上起，我一直在等他打电话。

segments.en: But I still haven't heard from him.
segments.cn: 但我仍然没有听到他的消息。

segments.en: You don't think he's seeing someone else?
segments.cn: 你不认为他在和别人约会吗？

segments.en: I'm sure everything is going to work out just fine.
segments.cn: 我相信一切都会好起来的。

segments.en: How can he do this to me?
I'm sure he's cheating on me.

segments.cn: 否则他为什么不打电话？

segments.en: But you two are on a break.
Theoretically, he can do whatever he likes.
segments.cn: 理论上，他可以做任何他想做的事。

segments.en: He's the love of my life.
It's going to be all right.
But I, I still love him.
I can't believe how immature and selfish I was being.
segments.cn: 我无法相信我有多幼稚和自私。

segments.en: I mean, he is a firefighter.
segments.cn: 我的意思是，他是一名消防员。

segments.en: It's not like he can just leave someone in a burning building and meet me for dinner.
segments.cn: 他不可能就这样把人留在燃烧的建筑里，然后来和我吃晚餐。

segments.en: I think you should make the first step.
segments.cn: 我觉得你应该迈出第一步。

segments.en: No, this is not gonna happen.
OK, so we saw Veronica's friend trying to calm her down.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们看到维罗妮卡的朋友试图安慰她。

segments.en: OK, to make her feel better.
Let's take a look at some of the phrases she used in Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 让我们看看她在流利表达中使用的一些短语。

segments.en: OK, so what was the first phrase that she said?
segments.cn: 好吧，她说的第一句话是什么？

segments.en: Everything is going to work out just fine.
Everything is going to work out just fine.
Everything is going to work out just fine.
It's going to be OK, right?
segments.cn: 一切都会好起来的，对吧？

segments.en: Yeah, the problem will be solved.
OK, so if somebody is worried or somebody is crying, you can say, ah, don't worry.
segments.cn: 好吧，如果有人担心或哭泣，你可以说，啊，别担心。

segments.en: Everything is going to work out just fine.
OK, OK, let's look at the next one.
segments.cn: 好吧，好吧，让我们看看下一个。

segments.en: So what does that mean exactly?
I know, I guess it just means stop crying, relax, and, you know, take a deep breath.
segments.cn: 我知道，我想这只是意味着停止哭泣，放松一下，深呼吸。

segments.en: Yeah, your ideas and your thoughts.
Yeah, so you can think of maybe somebody who's got tears down their face and everything is sort of in a mess.
segments.cn: 是的，所以你可以想象一个脸上流着泪水，四处都是混乱的人。

segments.en: If you pull it together, they clean up and they sort of relax, right?
segments.cn: 如果你振作起来，他们就会清理干净，放松下来，对吧？

segments.en: All right, and the last phrase that we saw, it's going to be all right.
segments.cn: 好的，最后一句话是，一切都会好起来的。

segments.en: It's going to be all right.
It's going to be all right.
It's going to be all right.
So it's going to be all right means everything is going to be OK.
segments.cn: 所以“一切都会好起来”意味着一切都会好。

segments.en: Yeah, it's going to be fine.
Maybe you could even say, it'll be all right.
segments.cn: 也许你甚至可以说，会好的。

segments.en: Yeah, yeah, it'll be all right.
Yeah, these are three really helpful phrases that you can use when you want to say something nice to a friend or a colleague who has a problem.
segments.cn: 是的，这三句非常有用的短语，你可以在想对有问题的朋友或同事说些好话时使用。

segments.en: So let's listen to some more examples.
segments.cn: 所以让我们听听更多的例子。

segments.en: Don't worry, everything is going to work out just fine.
segments.cn: 别担心，一切都会顺利解决。

segments.en: I'm sure he still loves you.
Everything is going to be all right.
And I think it's clear now.
So let's listen to our dialogue again, and then we'll come back and talk some more.
segments.cn: 所以让我们再听一遍我们的对话，然后我们再回来聊聊。

segments.en: So, so I said, let's take a break.
segments.cn: 所以，我说，让我们休息一下。

segments.en: And since that night, I've been waiting for him to call, but I still haven't heard from him.
segments.cn: 自那天晚上以来，我一直在等他打电话，但我仍然没有听到他的消息。

segments.en: You don't think he's seeing someone else, do you?
segments.cn: 你不认为他在和别人约会吧？

segments.en: Come on, don't be so dramatic.
I'm sure everything is going to work out just fine.
segments.cn: 我相信一切都会顺利解决。

segments.en: Oh no, how did he do this to me?
segments.cn: 哦不，他怎么能这样对我？

segments.en: I'm sure he's cheating on me.

segments.cn: 不然他为什么不打电话？

segments.en: But you two are on a break.
Theoretically, he can do whatever he likes.
segments.cn: 理论上，他可以做任何他想做的事。

segments.en: He's the love of my life.
Come on, hon, pull yourself together.
It's going to be all right.
But I, I still love him and it's all my fault.
segments.cn: 但我，我仍然爱着他，这一切都是我的错。

segments.en: I can't believe how immature and selfish I was being.
segments.cn: 我无法相信我有多幼稚和自私。

segments.en: I mean, he is a firefighter.
segments.cn: 我的意思是，他是一名消防员。

segments.en: It's not like he can just leave someone in a burning building and meet me for dinner.
segments.cn: 他不可能就这样把人留在燃烧的建筑里，然后来和我吃晚餐。

segments.en: I think you should make the first step.
segments.cn: 我觉得你应该迈出第一步。

segments.en: No, this is not going to happen.

segments.cn: 我真的很喜欢这个对话。

segments.en: It's drama, but at the same time romantic.
segments.cn: 这是戏剧，但同时又浪漫。

segments.en: So we want to know what you think will happen next.
segments.cn: 所以我们想知道你认为接下来会发生什么。

segments.en: Yeah, will they get back together?
Maybe she'll move halfway across the world.
segments.cn: 也许她会搬到世界的另一边。
任何事情都有可能发生。

segments.en: So let us know what you think will happen.
segments.cn: 所以让我们知道你认为会发生什么。

segments.en: Come to our website at EnglishPod.com and leave your comments on the lesson page.
segments.cn: 来到我们的网站 EnglishPod.com，在课程页面留下你的评论。

segments.en: Okay, so we're out of time for today.
I hope you guys had fun and we'll see you next time.
segments.cn: 希望你们玩得开心，我们下次见。
